column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Zuko says : " You 're sure you were n't followed ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Look , we escaped from the Dai Li .
#Text=We got Appa back .
#Text=I 'm telling you , we should go to the Earth King now and tell him our plan .
#Text=We 're on a roll .
#Text=" Katara says : " One good hour after weeks of trouble is n't much of a roll .
#Text=" Sokka says : " We can build on it .
#Text=If we want to invade the Fire Nation when the eclipse happens , we 'll need the Earth King 's support .
#Text=" Toph says : " What makes you think we 'll get it ?
#Text=I do n't know if you 've noticed , but things do n't usually go that smoothly for our little gang .
#Text=" Sokka says : " I know , but I 've got a good feeling about this .
#Text=This time will be different .
#Text=" Katara says : " Sokka , Long Feng is in control of the city .
#Text=His conspiracy with the Dai Li is too powerful .
#Text=I think we should just keep flying and leave this horrible place behind us .
#Text=" Toph says : " I 'm with Sweetness .
#Text=I 've seen enough of Ba Sing Se .
#Text=And I ca n't even see !
#Text=" Aang says : " But now that we have Appa back , there 's nothing stopping us from telling the Earth King the truth .
#Text=About the conspiracy and the War .
#Text=" Sokka says : " See ?
#Text=Aang 's with me .
#Text=It 's the whole reason we came here in the first place .
#Text=We have to try .
#Text=" Katara says : " Well , I guess if the Earth King knew the truth , things could change .
#Text=" Toph says : " I do n't trust the new positive Sokka .
#Text=Long Feng brainwashed you , did n't he !?
#Text=" Sokka says : " That 's probably the Dai Li searching for us .
#Text=So ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Let 's fly !
#Text=" Toph says : " Can we please buy a new saddle ?
#Text=Riding bareback is terrifying !
#Text=" Sokka says : " There it is !
#Text=That whole thing is the palace !
#Text=The Earth King 's chamber should be in the center !
#Text=" Katara says : " We have to be careful .
#Text=Long Feng 's probably warned the king that we 're coming .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Why would you assume that ?
#Text=If you ask me , I think we 're just gon na sail right in and - Aahh !
#Text=" Toph says : " What was that ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Surface - to - air rocks !
#Text=More incoming !
#Text=" Katara says : " Sorry !
#Text=" Katara says : " Sorry !
#Text=We just need to get through to see the Earth King !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Seriously , we 're actually on your guys ' side !
#Text=Sorry .
#Text=" Sokka says : " In there !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Toph , which way to the Earth King ?
#Text=" Toph says : " How should I know ?
#Text=I 'm still voting we leave Ba Sing Se .
#Text=" Palace woman says : " Burglar !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Sorry .
#Text=Wrong door .
#Text=" Iroh says : " You did the right thing .
#Text=Letting the Avatar 's bison go free .
#Text=" Zuko says : " I do n't feel right .
#Text=" Iroh says : " Zuko !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Now that 's an impressive door .
#Text=It 's got ta go somewhere .
#Text=Yaaah !
#Text=A little warning next time ?
#Text=" Aang says : " We need to talk to you .
#Text=" Long Feng says : " They 're here to overthrow you .
#Text=" Sokka says : " No , we 're on your side .
#Text=We 're here to help .
#Text=" Katara says : " You have to trust us .
#Text=" Kuei says : " You invade my palace , lay waste to all my guards , break down my fancy door , and you expect me to trust you ?
#Text=" Toph says : " He has a good point .
#Text=" Kuei says : " If you are on my side , then drop your weapons and stand down !
#Text=" Aang says : " See ?
#Text=We 're friends , Your Earthiness .
#Text=" Long Feng says : " Detain the assailants !
#Text=" Sokka says : " But we dropped our weapons .
#Text=We 're your allies .
#Text=" Long Feng says : " Make sure the Avatar and his friends never see daylight again .
#Text=" Kuei says : " The Avatar ?
#Text=You 're the Avatar ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Uh , no .
#Text=Him .
#Text=" Aang says : " Over here .
#Text=" Long Feng says : " What does it matter , Your Highness ?
#Text=They 're enemies of the state .
#Text=" Kuei says : " Perhaps you 're right .
#Text=Though Bosco seems to like him .
#Text=I 'll hear what he has to say .
#Text=" Aang says : " Well , sir , there 's a war going on right now .
#Text=For the past one hundred years in fact .
#Text=The Dai Li 's kept it secret from you .
#Text=It 's a conspiracy to control the city , and to control you .
#Text=" Kuei says : " A secret war ?
#Text=That 's crazy !
#Text=" Long Feng says : " Completely !
#Text=" Aang says : " Long Feng did n't want us to tell you , so he stole our sky bison to blackmail us .
#Text=And blackmail is the least of his crimes ; he brainwashed our friend !
#Text=" Long Feng says : " All lies .
#Text=I 've never even seen a sky bison , Your Majesty .
#Text=Frankly , I thought they were extinct .
#Text=" Kuei says : " Your claim is difficult to believe .
#Text=Even from an Avatar .
#Text=" Long Feng says : " These hooligans are part of an anarchist cell that my agents have been tracking for weeks .
#Text=If you listen to them , you 're playing right into your own destruction .
#Text=" Kuei says : " I have to trust my advisor .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Wait !
#Text=I can prove he 's lying .
#Text=Long Feng said he 's never seen a sky bison .
#Text=Ask him to lift his robe .
#Text=" Long Feng says : " What ?
#Text=I am not disrobing !
#Text=" Aang says : " Right there !
#Text=Appa bit him !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Never met a sky bison , huh ?
#Text=" Long Feng says : " That happens to be a large birth mark .
#Text=Thanks for showing everyone .
#Text=" Kuei says : " Well I suppose there 's no way to prove where those marks came from .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Of course there is !
#Text=" Kuei says : " Yup .
#Text=That pretty much proves it .
#Text=But it does n't prove this crazy conspiracy theory .
#Text=Though , I suppose this matter 's worth looking into .
#Text=" Iroh says : " You 're burning up .
#Text=You have an intense fever .
#Text=This will help cool you down .
#Text=" Zuko says : " So thirsty .
#Text=" Iroh says : " Here 's some clean water to drink .
#Text=Stay under the blankets and sweat this out .
#Text=" Kuei says : " So this is what a train is like ?
#Text=I did n't realize it would be this ... public .
#Text=" Katara says : " So you 've never been outside the Upper Ring before ?
#Text=" Kuei says : " I 've never been outside the palace .
#Text=Now that 's the way to travel .
#Text=So , may I ask where we 're going ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Underneath Lake Laogai , Your Kingliness .
#Text=To the Dai Li 's secret headquarters .
#Text=You 're about to see where all the brainwashing and conspiring took place .
#Text="
